verses.name: 2 Samuel 15:9
verses.text: And the king said unto him, Go in peace. So he arose, and went to Hebron.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 15:10
verses.text: But Absalom sent spies throughout all the tribes of Israel, saying, As soon as ye hear the sound of the trumpet, then ye shall say, Absalom reigneth in Hebron.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 15:11
verses.text: And with Absalom went two hundred men out of Jerusalem, that were called; and they went in their simplicity, and they knew not any thing.
